This folder contains some FMRadioService external dependencies that
*are not* already packaged in download.tizen.org.

Below is some information (releases, vesion, urls) about each of
those dependencies so developer can easily update.


librtlsdr
************************
upstream version : 0.5.3
tarball filename : librtlsdr-0.5.3.tar.gz
URL to tarball   : https://github.com/steve-m/librtlsdr/archive/v0.5.3.tar.gz
Project website  : http://sdr.osmocom.org/trac/wiki/rtl-sdr

** NOTES : Since rtl-sdr maintainer, apparently, does not know
           how to properly release tarballs, the upstrean file-
           name given above (v0.5.3.tar.gz) does not correspond
           to our packaged tarball in /deps (librtlsdr-0.5.3.tar.gz).
           HOWEVER, IT IS THE SAME FILE, but had to be renamed when
           packaging this product.



FFTW
************************
upstream version : 3.3.4
tarball filename : fftw-3.3.4.tar.gz
URL to tarball   : http://www.fftw.org/fftw-3.3.4.tar.gz
Project website  : http://www.fftw.org/
Release notes    : http://www.fftw.org/release-notes.html



libsamplerate
***********************
upstream version : 0.1.8
tarball filename : libsamplerate-0.1.8.tar.gz
URL to tarball   : http://www.mega-nerd.com/SRC/libsamplerate-0.1.8.tar.gz
Project website  : http://www.mega-nerd.com/SRC/
